mapper.sql: id, province_id, city_id, area_id, phone, username, password, id_card, real_name, age, sex, email, recommend_code_self, recommend_user_id, recommend_user_type, recommend_income_type, recommend_date, head_url, wechat_openid, qq_openid, token_key, status, login_time, create_time, update_time, subject1_test_result_type, subject2_test_result_type, subject3_test_result_type, subject4_test_result_type, channel, phone_id, operator_id, platform, logon_channel
mapper.select: select tsi.*, tsse.study_enroll_no AS studyEnrollNo from t_student_info tsi left join t_service_return_visit_history tsrvh on tsi.id = tsrvh.student_id left join t_student_study_enroll tsse on tsse.student_id = tsi.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT tsi.*, tsse.study_enroll_no AS studyEnrollNo, tsrvh.return_visit_status AS returnVisitStatus, tsrvh.return_visit_item AS returnVisitItem, tsrvh.return_visit_time AS returnVisitTime, tsrvh.next_return_visit_time AS nextReturnVisitTime, tsrvh.is_intention AS isIntention FROM t_student_info tsi INNER join (select id, return_visit_type, return_visit_status, return_visit_item, order_detail_no, student_id, is_intention, max(return_visit_time) as return_visit_time, return_visit_content, next_return_visit_time from t_service_return_visit_history GROUP BY student_id) as tsrvh on tsi.id = tsrvh.student_id LEFT JOIN t_student_study_enroll tsse ON tsse.student_id = tsi.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select tsi.*, tsse.study_enroll_no AS studyEnrollNo from t_student_info tsi INNER join t_service_return_visit_history tsrvh on tsi.id = tsrvh.student_id left join t_student_study_enroll tsse on tsse.student_id = tsi.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
